casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Matthew Garret MCMAHAN 238P19-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 24, 2019 Charlotte G. Blake, Attorney at Law, Boone, for McMahan, Matthew Garret. Kathryn H. Shields, Joseph L. Hyde, Assistant Attorney Generals, Todd Williams, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 21st of June 2019 by State of NC for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 24th of June 2019."
